attributes.action: Deliveries for the vulnerable in all pharmacies as an NHS Essential Service
attributes.additional_details: Currently (exception to Covid guidance) pharmacies have been supplying a lifeline of free delivery to patients without any additional funding to those deemed vulnerable
attributes.background: The government must fund all pharmacies to be able to supply medication to all those that are vulnerable that includes elderly patients those, whom are deemed disabled.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Free prescription delivery is already available. You can find out more here:

https://www.nhs.uk/apps-library/echo/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
